Title:
Elasticsearch Engineer
Location:
Full Remote
Salary:
$130,000 $150,000/year
Requirements:
Elasticsearch, Python, Azure Functions
We are a 200 person extremely well-funded software company in the agricultural solutions space. We are focused on unlocking the global genetic potential of plants to enhance the sustainability of food, feed, fiber, and fuel production. We and our partners harness natural and novel genetic variation through breeding, trait development, etc. to develop products that accelerate crop improvement.
We have been ranked in the Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies for the past several years. We are currently in a major growth phase and hiring a Elasticsearch Engineer to help us improve our search functionality.
What You Will Be Doing
Design and build search indexes and complex search queries.
Setup an administration of search engine clusters in Azure.
Transform and ingest data into search engine.
Work within a cloud based platform; Azure
Build security focused applications by leveraging best practices
What You Need for this Position
Design of Elasticsearch index and complex search queries.
Setup and administration of Elasticsearch clusters in Azure.
Python
Azure Functions
What's In It for You
Work Remote
Competitive salary ($130k - $150k)
401k match
Stable / Fast Growing / Exciting company
Full Benefits (health, dental, vision, etc.)
